Navigation:

Arrow keys: Navigate links and scroll.
g: Go to a specific URL.
?: View help and available commands.
q: Quit Lynx.
Bookmarks and History:

a: Add a bookmark.
v: Visit bookmarks.
h: View browsing history.
Search:

/: Search for text on the current page.
=: Search using an external search engine.
Page Manipulation:

d: Download a file.
z: Zoom options for text size.
Page Information:

i: Display info about the current page.
File and Configuration Management:

.: Go to Lynx options menu.
o: Open a file.
c: Configuration options and settings.
Other Features:

Support for SSL/TLS.
Text-based browsing with color support.
Can display tables and forms in a text-based format.#Work In Progress
